fields.label: Flexible Content Block
fields.name: block_flexible_content
fields.instructions: Add any number of Content Block Components

sub_fields.label: Attach to Side
sub_fields.name: attach_to_side
sub_fields.instructions: The site design allows images to be "attached" to the side of the screen, breaking out of the container, and sticking to the side of the page.

fields.label: Shortcode Block
fields.name: block_shortcode
fields.instructions: Add a shortcode to the text field.  Should be of the form [shortcodename attribute='value']
